Armour.Name: Veilwalker's Mantle
Armour.Description: A cloak that shimmers with a light-absorbing material, perfect for moving unseen.
Armour.DefensiveCapabilities: Makes the wearer nearly invisible in low light

Armour.Name: Shadowstep Boots
Armour.Description: Boots crafted from the essence of shadows, they leave no trace and silence the wearer's footsteps.

Armour.Name: Mask of the Veil
Armour.Description: A mask that allows the wearer to peer into the shadow realm without being detected by its inhabitants.
Armour.DefensiveCapabilities: Allows the user to see entities within the shadow realm
